endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of videos available for streaming, along with metadata such as title and duration.
Analyze a specific video for potential quality enhancements based on provided criteria.
Retrieve the current status and analytics of ongoing live video streams.
Optimize the bandwidth and quality of an ongoing live video stream.
List the adaptive streaming protocols supported by the service.
Update video quality settings to improve compatibility and performance.
Configure the service for integration with a third-party video platform.
Generate and retrieve detailed reports on the performance of video streams.
Terminate a specified live video stream by its identifier.
Enhance the visual and transmission quality of a submitted video for better viewing.
